sentences.en: Paramilitaries and army recruits patrolled the village.
sentences.cn: 准军事组织成员和部队的新兵在村子里巡逻。

sentences.en: Paramilitary police were sent to the village to pursue the attackers, he said.
sentences.cn: 他说, 武警已经被派往到该村追捕武装分子.

trans.tran_en: relating to or helping a military organization
Paramilitaries are members of a paramilitary organization
